channel.title: Status page
channel.description: why cant i add my server to the status page? i have it running but when i try to add it, he server page says that my server is offline. also why can't anyone connect to my server? [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] The Server Development/Help section is strictly for the server, this means no discussion about the client, trouble with compiling in general, and anything other than the development of servers and otherwise.[/center]

item.title: Status page

item.description:
@r_4_v_1 wrote:

Well dragon197989, the main problem is if you have no-ip.duc. Then you will have to uncheck your i-p and check it again, then see :), i have experienced the same problems good luck ok?

                                                                    Thanks, R 4 V 1 ;)
